days.notes: Spring Festival Day 1. Travel from Bazhong to Chengdu (¥80 train). Budget-friendly meals: Lao Wu baozi breakfast (¥5), Lao Qi beef lunch (¥20), Qinshanzhai dinner (¥50). Shopping at Taikoo Li evening stroll (¥150). Family accommodation free.

Busy travel day. Morning: Panda Base (¥55), Jinli Ancient Street (¥80), flight to Shanghai (prepaid). Evening: Bund walk (free), premium buffet dinner (¥324), Shanghai SK Lusso Hotel (¥615). Transportation: Chengdu metro/bus (¥15) + Shanghai taxis (¥55).

Shanghai Disneyland full day. Park ticket (¥475), in-park lunch (¥80), dinner (¥90). Hotel breakfast included. No shopping budget allocated. Transportation not needed (hotel near Disney).

Waterfront exploration day. Morning: M Stand coffee (¥28), Waitan Jiayan Shanghai cuisine lunch (¥135). Afternoon: Suzhou Creek walk (free), The Bund walk (free), Nanjing Road stroll (¥100 POP MART). Evening: Pudong cycling/ferry (¥4 total), TOP TOY (¥60), HKRI Taikoo Hui (¥200), Anken Green (¥100). Late dinner at Bairong New Shandong Cuisine (¥455, MICHELIN GUIDE). Hotel SK Lusso (¥615/night). Entertainment: Drum/Puppet show (¥160). Transportation: minimal, mostly walking.

Travel day. Flight MU5129 Shanghai to Beijing (prepaid). Airport breakfast (¥55). Quick lunch before university registration (¥25). Pre-theater quick dinner (¥30). Orange Hotel 1 night (¥328). Evening dance drama 'Only This Green' (¥580) - critical booking, verify schedule. No shopping budget allocated.

University area setup day. Hotel breakfast included. University canteen lunch (¥10). First dinner at rental apartment area (¥30). Move to rental apartment (¥287/night for 13 nights starting Day 9). No activities or shopping planned - focused on settling in.

Dance studio registration day. Local breakfast (¥8), university area lunch (¥20), Korean dinner after class (¥60). Rental apartment (¥287). Dance studio registration (free but may have fees). Evening coffee entertainment (¥30).
Wednesday - girlfriend has class. Local meals near apartment. Evening coffee (¥40). Shopping at Wudaokou area (¥80). Rental apartment (¥287). No far trips due to class schedule.
Thursday - girlfriend has class. Local meals. Hotpot dinner (¥110). Evening coffee entertainment (¥35). Shopping at Wudaokou (¥80). Rental apartment (¥287).

Friday - full day available. Forbidden City visit (¥40). Late lunch at Fangzhuang zhajiangmian (¥20). Premium Peking duck dinner at Beimen Shuan (¥100). Couple photography session (¥600) - requires advance booking. Shopping at 798 Art District (¥120). Rental apartment (¥287).

Coffee shops and cute shops day. Specialty coffee breakfast (¥45). Trendy restaurant lunch in Sanlitun (¥80). 798 Art District dinner (¥450). Shopping at POP MART (¥80), Sanlitun Village (¥200), SOLANA (¥150), Nanluoguxiang boutiques (¥100). Rental apartment (¥287).

Saturday - free day. Special breakfast (¥8). Beijing roast duck lunch at Quanjude or Da Dong (¥168) - must-try experience. Light dinner near apartment (¥30). Afternoon entertainment (¥140) - flexible options. Rental apartment (¥287).

Optional Tianjin day trip. Early breakfast (¥10). Train to Tianjin (estimated ¥54 round trip). Tianjin lunch (¥30) - try Goubuli baozi or erduoyan zhagao. Return Beijing dinner (¥30). If no Tianjin: free Beijing day. Rental apartment (¥287).
Tuesday - girlfriend has class. Local meals. Korean BBQ dinner in Wudaokou (¥65). Evening coffee entertainment (¥50). Shopping at Wudaokou (¥60). Rental apartment (¥287).
Wednesday - girlfriend has class. Local meals. Sichuan dinner (¥35). Evening coffee entertainment (¥35). Shopping at Wudaokou (¥60). Rental apartment (¥287).
Thursday - girlfriend has class. Local meals. Western dinner (¥80) - change of pace. Evening entertainment (¥65). Shopping at Wudaokou (¥60). Rental apartment (¥287).

Final day together. Special brunch at trendy spot (¥88). Lunch at shopping mall restaurant (¥80). Premium farewell dinner (¥320) - romantic memorable experience. Entertainment (¥200) - flexible options. Shopping for memorable gifts: SKP luxury (¥300), Galeries Lafayette (¥250), Zhang Yi Yuan tea (¥100). Rental apartment (¥287).
Departure day. Local breakfast (¥10). Lunch near apartment or airport (¥35). No dinner - travel day. Rental apartment final night (¥287).

notes: BUDGET RECALCULATION COMPLETE (2026-02-12). Day 1 budget updated based on transportation.json and entertainment.json changes. Previous Day 1: ¥1,578. New Day 1: ¥1,670.
